```The key is in Africalaptop stand'```

results.name: Evil machine
results.description:
in the back of the old NeonArcade stood a forgotten rhythm machine called Rythme Revolution. One night it powered on by itself and displayed a strange message:
“FOLLOW THE BEAT. UNLOCK THE CODE.”
`nc tcp.espark.tn 5569`

> Author :Z3U55

results.name: LEVEL 1 : BOSS GATE
results.description:
**ARCADE OVERDRIVE - BOSS GATE LEVEL 1**

The year is 20XX. You stand before the first Boss Gate of the legendary 
Arcade Overdrive tournament. Four guardians protect the entrance, each 
more powerful than the last.

Legends speak of hackers turned away by its defenses. Some say it reads 
intentions. Others claim it speaks in tongues no parser understands. 
A few whisper about weaknesses in ancient authentication rituals.

The final boss holds the Master Override Code. Defeat all guardians to 
claim it and advance to the next level.

**Author**: Angel911

results.name: Commit & Regret
results.description:
Someone pushed, panicked, and tried to rewrite history...
and thought it worked.

Prove them wrong.

**Author :** Z10UD1

results.name: Reality
results.description:
Everyone received an apology email from Dr.Wily ... or so it seemed.
It promised peace, but it was a cunning trap. 

Help Mega Man and victims uncover the hidden danger and stop wily's scheme.

Task_file : ` Handout_Reality.7z`

**Author :** Z10UD1

results.name: The Hill Surveillance
results.description:
Deep in the pixelated mountains, an access point called "The Hill" broadcasts 
  from an abandoned surveillance station. They say someone up there is always 
  watching the valley below.

  You've intercepted a password: "buttercupde". The signal is strong. The 
  network is active. Something is recording.

  The Hill sees all. What does The Hill see?

  **Author**: Angel911

results.name: LEVEL 2 : ARCADIA'S COMPROMISE
results.description:
ARCADIA's front gate barriers are unreachable!!

Go Ahead It's TIME TO SHINE!!

Handout_Forensics_BBA.7z Pwd : `CyberMaze_BBA2025`

`nc tcp.espark.tn 8003`

```
Q1) sha256sum of the archive : 
Q2) what's the port assigned for rdp? : 
Q3) name of the firewall rule that allows that port : 
Q4) what's the ip of the attacker? : 
Q5) what's the sus workstation name? :  
Q6) how many failed RDP requests before logging in remotely : 
Q7) windows Timestamp of the successful login(UTC) (Format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS) : 
Q8) what's the hash/password of the victim (Hash_Password) : 
Q9) The attacker dropped an .exe file during the RDP session as a part  of the exploit what's its name?  : 
Q10) SHA256sum of the malicious command : 
Q11) When was the exploit executed? [System time] (Format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS) : 
Q12) The Exploit dumped some sort of creds can you recover them? : (Username:Password) : 
Q13)To persist the attacker created/added a new user to the local Administrators group (Format Username:Password) : 
Q14)The attacker went further to compromize a second server Timestamp of the second hop [UTC] (Format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS ): 
Q15) 2nd hop server's Name/IP : (Format WorkstationName_IP) : 
Q16) What did the attacker find upon landing on the 2nd server : 
```

**author**: sn0_0wyy

results.name: Enchantement_Ritual
results.description:
In every tale whispered across the old kingdoms, the hero’s journey begins the same way.
    Before facing dragons, shadow beasts, or whatever gonk-spawned horror lurks in forgotten ruins, the hero must seek an enchantment.
    But the artifact is unstable, its magic imperfect, its runes flawed.

    Those who understand its inner workings can reveal more than just enchanted words.
    
    ```nc 34.51.233.21 6020 ``` to get access to your enchanting table.
		> Author: grayaa

results.name: Sparkade
results.description:
The neon hums a lullaby of forgotten code. Within the Sparkade, every machine plays by a strict, unbreakable rule set. Victory doesn't go to the swift, but to those who can read between the lines of execution.

**link**:http://34.51.238.253:4003/

**Author**:L3benn

results.name: Robobook
results.description:
Dr. Wily has created RoboBook, an exclusive social media platform for villains and Robot Masters!
The platform has become the central hub for coordinating attacks on the city of 20XX.

Mega Man managed to infiltrate and create an account with username "mega_man", but he forgot
his password and can't access the system. Dr. Light is locked out completely, and the Robot
Masters are using the platform to plan their next attack!

Your mission: Help Mega Man regain access, infiltrate Dr. Wily's admin account, and submit
the Master Override Code to shut down all Robot Masters before it's too late!
**Author**: Angel911
🤖 **Connection Info:**
[LINK](http://34.51.233.21:4000)

results.name: No UI No CRY
results.description:
A minimal internal tool accepts user input and returns… not much.
  But somewhere in the background, something renders your data.

  You're handed a token, a form, and silence.
  Can you turn that into access?

  **author**: BOU3RADA
